title: An Act to protect against election misinformation

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Farley-Bouvier of Pittsfield, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 76) of Tricia Farley-Bouvier relative to materially deceptive election-related communications.  Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

related_entities.name: committee on Advanced Information Technology, the Internet and Cybersecurity

actions.description: Hearing rescheduled to 09/11/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2                                                                                                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to include Virtual
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on House Ways and Means
the committee on House Ways and Means

actions.description: Committee recommended bill ought to pass and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on House Ways and Means
the committee on House Ways and Means

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass with an amendment, substituting therefor a bill with the same title, see H5093
Referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting for a second reading with the amendment pending
Read second, amended (as recommended by the committee on House Ways and Means)
